com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheaplong
Class LongPacker

java.lang.Object
  com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheaplong.LongPacker

public class LongPacker
extends Object

Contains static methods for packing two values with limited size (one long and one int) into one long value. May be used to pack values before placing them into OffHeapLongAddressable. Values are stored using bit shifting as follows: 

 0                             32        64-bits             64
  +-----------------------------+-----------+------------------+
  | first 32 bits of long value | int value | tail of long val |
  +-----------------------------+-----------+------------------+
This class doesn't use sun.misc.Unsafe

Author:
alexkasko Date: 1/14/13

Method Detail

pack

public static long pack(long big,
                        int little,
                        int bits)
Packs one long value with limited size and one int value into one long value. Values limits are checking using assert keyword, java must be run with -ea switch to enable them.

Parameters:
big - long value
little - int value
bits - max size of long value in bits, max size of int value is 64 - bits
Returns:
packed long value
